data.actual_result: Context menu doesn't open, an error returns in the console and now you get an error if you right click on ANYTHING (as seen in the attached GIF) :­blobsad­:
data.expected_result: It opens up the context menu on the user
data.short_description: Right clicking in the new dark mode Reactions menu returns error & breaks every further click in the client
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message with reactions - Open the reactions menu (surely you know how to get there) - Right click a user
